DOC.detailed_description: Delayed cord clamping ( DCC ) : Well described phenomenon term infant . - The optimal timing clamp umbilical cord preterm infant : A subject debate . - Even brief delay cord clamp lead additional transfer iron amount 40-50 mg/kg may prevent iron deficiency.ยน - This low cost intervention significant public health importance resource constrain setting . - The effect intervention neurobehaviour preterm neonate assess . - This aspect identify WHO Cochrane potentially researchable area
